amendment.description: To amend chapter 53 of title 49, United States Code, relating to the authorization of Federal funding for public transportation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2269 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2269 proposed by Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S616-642) To amend chapter 53 of title 49, United States Code, relating to the authorization of Federal funding for public transportation, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2269 proposed by Senator Shelby.
